title: Graphs of Functions - Points of Intersection

content.question: The function <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals open parentheses x squared minus 3 close parentheses sin open parentheses x minus 1 close parentheses"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>. The function <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="k open parentheses x close parentheses equals cos x"><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi></math>. On the closed interval <math alttext="open square brackets 0 comma 2 pi close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>, what are the <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>-coordinates of the points of intersection of the graphs of <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> and <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> in the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane?

choices.label: <math alttext="x equals negative 0.510"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>0.510</mn></math>, <math alttext="x equals negative 0.110"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>0.110</mn></math>, and <math alttext="x equals 0.772"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.772</mn></math>

<math alttext="x equals 0.689"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.689</mn></math>, <math alttext="x equals 1.681"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.681</mn></math>, and <math alttext="x equals 4.177"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4.177</mn></math>

<math alttext="x equals 1"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>, <math alttext="x equals 1.732"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.732</mn></math>, and <math alttext="x equals 4.142"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4.142</mn></math>

<math alttext="x equals 1.379"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.379</mn></math>, <math alttext="x equals 3.274"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.274</mn></math>, and <math alttext="x equals 6.058"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6.058</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="x equals 0.689"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.689</mn></math>, <math alttext="x equals 1.681"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.681</mn></math>, and <math alttext="x equals 4.177"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4.177</mn></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
